title: Miami beats Ohio State to reach football playoff semifinals
snippets: Keionte Scott returned an interception 72 yards for a touchdown, Carson Beck threw a scoring pass, and No. 10 Miami shocked defending champion Ohio State 24-14 at the Cotton Bowl in the first College Football Playoff quarterfinal.
On Wednesday, No. 10 seed Miami upset No. 2 seed Ohio State 24-14 in the College Football Playoff quarterfinals. The Hurricanes won their sixth consecutive game.
Miami Closes a 23-Year Wound By Finally Slaying Its Ohio State Demon in CFP Sports Illustrated

ARLINGTON, Texas — Keionte Scott returned an interception 72 yards for a touchdown, Carson Beck had a TD pass and No. 10 Miami shocked defending champion Ohio State 24-14 on Wednesday night at the Cotton Bowl in the first College Football Playoff quarterfinal. The Hurricanes (12-2, CFP No. 10 seed) have won two playoff games to get into football’s final four after needing an at-large berth to make the 12-team field, after not even without playing in the Atlantic Coast Conference championship game. One more win and they will get to play for a national championship in their home stadium. Next...
titles: Miami knocks off Ohio State, marches on in CFP

summary: No. 10 seed Miami defeated No. 2 seed and defending champion Ohio State 24-14 in the College Football Playoff quarterfinals at the Cotton Bowl. Keionte Scott returned an interception 72 yards for a touchdown, and Carson Beck threw a touchdown pass. Miami has now won six straight games and advances to the playoff semifinals, moving one win away from the national championship game.

The Italian Foreign Ministry announced that proposed levies of up to 92% will be slashed. This decision aims to ease trade tensions and support Italian exports to the US.

summary: Apple has cut production of its Vision Pro virtual reality headset due to poor sales. The company has also reduced marketing for the device, which faced challenges such as high prices, limited apps, and comfort issues. These factors have made it difficult for Apple to turn the Vision Pro into a mainstream product.

title: America 250 celebration starts with lights at Washington Monument
snippets: NYE Washington Monument illumination kicks off Trump's yearlong America 250 celebration Axios
President Trump's plans for wide-scale celebrations to commemorate the nation's 250th birthday got underway on New Year's Eve with the illumination of the Washington Monument on the National Mall.

summary: President Trump's America 250 celebration began on New Year's Eve with the illumination of the Washington Monument on the National Mall. The event marks the start of a yearlong series of activities to commemorate the nation's 250th birthday. The celebration is expected to include additional events throughout 2026.

title: Cities welcome 2026 with fireworks around the world
snippets: As Big Ben chimed midnight, London celebrated 2026 with fireworks over the River Thames.
Egypt celebrated the New Year with fireworks over the pyramids in Giza.
Paris lit up the sky above the Arc de Triomphe with a fireworks display as France's capital rang in 2026.
Fireworks illuminated the sky over Edinburgh Castle as Scotland celebrated the new year.
titles: WATCH:  London lights up the River Thames to ring in the new year
WATCH:  Fireworks over the Pyramids of Giza as Egypt celebrates new year
WATCH:  Fireworks over the Arc de Triomphe as Paris rings in the new year
WATCH:  Fireworks over Edinburgh Castle as Scotland celebrates the new year
constructiveness_reason: This story offers basic awareness about a cultural event in London but does not provide any deeper understanding or actionable insights for the reader.
summary: Cities around the world marked the start of 2026 with fireworks displays. London celebrated with fireworks over the River Thames as Big Ben struck midnight. In Egypt, fireworks lit up the pyramids in Giza. Paris held a display above the Arc de Triomphe, and Edinburgh celebrated with fireworks over its castle.
